law.catch_line: Any fee collected under this subtitle constitutes a special fund to be used only to defray partially...
law.text: Any fee collected under this subtitle constitutes a special fund to be used only to defray partially the cost of inspection, sampling, analysis, and other expenses incident to administering this subtitle. Notwithstanding any other provisions of this Code, any unexpended funds up to a maximum of $100,000 may not revert to the General Fund of the State at the end of the fiscal year.
